input.sentences: stained glass religious windows from inside the old church .
an image of christ in another window .
this church has amazing artwork within the windows .
output.sentences: The church had just been built with new stained glass windows.
The church goers made sure to put in some dead Jesus's.
These particular church goers like to see white Jesus dressed like an Arab man.
There was special care taken to make sure all the other men on the windows were in fancy clothes, too.
While some characters wore dark clothes, the congregations favorite color scheme was yellow and blue.
